$X$ and $Y$ are jointly absolutely continuous with joint density

$$
f_{XY}(x,\, y)
=
\frac{1}{8}
(y^2-x^2)
e^{-y}
,\quad 
y>0
;\,
-y<x<y.
$$

a.  Sketch $\textrm{Range}(X,\, Y)$.
a.  Compute the marginal density of $X$.
a.  Compute the marginal density of $Y$.
a.  Compute the conditional density of $X$ given $Y = y$.
a.  Compute the conditional density of $Y$ given $X = x$.
